page.title: 11Transport
page.content: Most people in the area own their own cars and many young people have bicycles.Penyffordd is served by both bus and train routes.The bus services are based mainly in Chester travelling through Penyffordd to mold, via Buckley ,Broughton and Saltney.the service is run by Crosville who also provide a sevice to Wrexham.Penyffordd railway station is situated on the Bidston to Wrexham line.From Wrexham connections can be caught to Chester, Shrewsbury,Cardiff,Birmingham and London.From Bidston you can travel by rail to Birkenhead and Liverpoool or alternatively cross the River Mersey by ferry.Liverpool is a mia centre for British Rail intercity network, providing links with London, Scotland. The British Rail service through Penyfordd has been under threat of closure for several years.
